sentences.en: Built two product lines of metal powder and aluminum alloy additive 、 metal additive, grain refiner.
sentences.cn: 建立了金属粉末和铝熔铸业用熔剂、金属添加剂 、 细化剂两套生产线.

sentences.en: Disc refiner: Machine which refines pulp by rubbing fibres between vertical rotating discs.
sentences.cn: 碟型磨浆机: 由两片垂直旋转的碟构成的打浆机器.它把纤维作精细的研磨.

sentences.en: On the same day Ida commanded attention, refiner Tesoro was halving its dividend to preserve cash.
sentences.cn: 就在“艾达”引起注意的同一天,Tesoro公司为储备现金,将分红削减了一半.

sentences.en: Several methods for refining grains including annealing, adding grain refiner and quenching were discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了细化晶粒的几种方法:退火 、 添加晶粒细化剂和激冷.

sentences.en: Sinopec, China's largest oil refiner, is also a major service - station operator.
sentences.cn: 而中国最大的炼油企业中国石化同时也经营著大量加油站.

sentences.en: Stainless steel refiner, grinding finer and more health.
sentences.cn: 不锈钢磨浆机, 研磨更精细,更卫生.

sentences.en: The refiner defined a definite confine with her fine finger.
sentences.cn: 提炼者用她精细的手指定义了一个明确的界限。

sentences.en: The review about the recent research results and the development status of grain refiner is presented.
sentences.cn: 综述近些年来铝合金晶粒细化剂的研究与应用状况.

sentences.en: This paper studied the precision form technology of long life pulp refiner plate.
sentences.cn: 磨盘是高浓磨机中易损件,其使用寿命直接影响着纸浆质量和生产效率.

sentences.en: Thought of refiner with refining control system based of DCS, its working theory is introduced.
sentences.cn: 基于DCS打浆控制系统的双盘磨为研究对象, 简要介绍双盘磨控制系统的工作原理.

words.tran_cn: [油气][化工][冶] 精炼的；精确的；微妙的；有教养的
精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯

trans.tran_en: Refiners are people or organizations that refine substances such as oil or sugar in order to sell them
